alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued December 18 at 3:43PM HST until December 20 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MONDAY MORNING... ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI FROM 3 PM HST MONDAY MORNING TO 6 PM HST TUESDAY... .Surf will rise rapidly tonight and Monday and remain extra large through Tuesday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM HST MONDAY... ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM MONDAY TO 6 PM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves of 25 to 40 feet. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, and Molokai, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...For the High Surf Warning, from 3 AM Monday to 6 PM HST Tuesday. For the High Surf Advisory, until 3 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Very High...Expect ocean water surging and sweeping across beaches, coastal benches, and lava flows creating the potential for impacts to coastal properties and infrastructure, including roadways. Powerful longshore and rip currents will be present at most beaches.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Large breaking surf, significant shorebreak, and dangerous currents make entering the water very hazardous. Anyone entering the water could face significant injury or death.
